relation: How do you make any note sharp (#)?
How do you make any note flat (b)?
What is the pattern for the Tetrachord + a Whole Step?
How do you create any major chord?
How do you create any minor chord?
Play the very next note to the right.
Play the very next note to the left.
Any 2 notes right next to eachother.
A whole step is equal to 2 half steps added together.
Whole step, whole step, 1/2 step, whole step.
1. Play the tetrachord + a whole step. 2. The play only notes 1, 3 and 5 of the tetrachord + a whole step. TA DA! There's your major chord.
1. Create the major chord first. 2. Then lower the 3rd a 1/2 step.
